description: A delicious, warming soup that has a bit of kick.
name: Chorizo Sweet Potato & Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g sweet potato, chopped into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pot on medium heat, add chorizo, cook stirring for about 2 minutes or until browned, remove and set aside.
Into same pot, add olive oil, onion and garlic, cook for 2 minutes or until onion softens.
Add sweet potato, pumpkin and stock, bring to boil, reduce heat to medium, cook stirring occasionally for around 15 minutes or until sweet potato and pumpkin are tender.
Return chorizo back to pot, set aside to cool slightly.
Using a stick blender, blend until all combined and soup is smooth.
Add 1/2 cup of cream (keeping 1/4 cup to add before serving) stirring well to combine.
Check for seasoning, I find it doesn't need any.
Ladle Soup into serving bowls, drizzle with remaining cream, sprinkle with toasted pepitas.
Can serve with homemade croutons. I just take one slice of sourdough bread, cubed, and toasted in one tablespoon of olive oil. Serve on the side.
